location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on linen.Dimensions: 448 x 495mm, on sheet 475 x 525mm.

mods.abstract: The map shows a section of the Aden harbour at the foot of a hill, including the Messagerie's coal wharf; the Messrs Luke Thomas & Co. coal wharves; the Messrs C D Bros premises; the coal grounds; the petrol godown; and the Muslim Burial Ground. A section of the map marked A - B - D - E denotes the area identified by the Admiralty to house the extended fuel storage.The map is stamped 'Civil Engineer in Chief. Admiralty'.
